title: Dialog says it installed antenna structure at Galle Face
body_lines: Dialog Axiata PLC said yesterday that it has installed a 20ft pole antenna structure at Galle Face Green as a solution to network congestion.

In the light of speculation circulating on social media with respect to the installation of a 6-metre (20ft) pole antenna structure at the Galle Face Green, Dialog Axiata PLC wishes to confirm that the said installation has been undertaken by the local communication giant.
The initiation of the said installation is one of the network solutions being implemented to alleviate the network congestion in the area experienced by our valued customers.
Capacity augmentation and quality of service improvement initiatives, in response to customer feedback are carried out by the company as part and parcel of its daily operations.
The activation of the augmented capacity will follow the receipt of TRCSL approvals.
